thread.section_title: Apex City of London Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Again, very nice stay
thread.title_full: Again, very nice stay - Review of Apex City of London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Rob d
title: Again, very nice stay
text: I've been to the hotel a fee times before and I selected it again for my staynof 3 nights in March. Nothing has changed! At that's good as they already had a more than average service delivery. Again I was very pleased with the atmosphere, friendliness of staff and the room. Will come back a next time!
